import React, {Component} from "react"; import Product from '../Product/Product'; import jQuery from 'jquery' import './Carousel.css' class Carousel extends Component { render(){ let obj = { "sfid": "p23999", "sfdcName": "Bontrager Flare RT Rear Bike Light", "alternateName": "Bontrager Flare RT Rear Bike Light", "shortDesc": "Bontrager Flare RT Rear Bike Light", "longDesc": "

A compact and powerful USB rechargeable rear bike light that's daytime visible from up to 2km away.

    • ); } componentDidMount(){ console.log("componentDidMount"); jQuery(document).ready(function() { jQuery('.carousel[data-type="multi"] .item').each(function(){ var next = jQuery(this).next(); if (!next.length) { next = jQuery(this).siblings(':first'); } next.children(':first-child').clone().appendTo(jQuery(this)); for (var i=0;i<2;i++) { next=next.next(); if (!next.length) { next = jQuery(this).siblings(':first'); } next.children(':first-child').clone().appendTo(jQuery(this)); } }); }); } } export default Carousel;
